headline: Legion Technologies Appoints Former Dayforce Executive Angela Stark as Chief Marketing Officer
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., December 09, 2025--Legion Technologies, the AI-native workforce management leader, today announced the appointment of former Dayforce executive Angela Stark as Chief Marketing Officer (CMO).
